items.title: Anthropic announces Claude for Healthcare following OpenAI’s ChatGPT Health reveal
items.description: Anthropic's Claude for Healthcare is unveiled about a week after OpenAI announced its ChatGPT Health product.

items.title: Pebble founder says his new company is ‘not a startup’
items.description: Pebble's founder talks about how his new company is doing things differently.

items.title: Anthropic’s new Cowork tool offers Claude Code without the code
items.description: Built into the Claude Desktop app, Cowork lets users designate a specific folder where Claude can read or modify files, with further instructions give...

items.title: Trump’s EPA plans to ignore health effects of air pollution
items.description: The Trump administration plans to stop assigning value to human life when analyzing the costs and benefits of air pollution controls.

items.title: Amazon says 97% of its devices can support Alexa+
items.description: Amazon is counting on its Alexa footprint to help it gain traction in the consumer AI race.
